recipesJson.name: Lemon Cookie
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description: It's the perfect sugary lemon cookie and a shake and vape as well.

reviews.text: Delivered as promised. This one is very simple, but very good! It's one of those that gets better over a few days, although it does the job perfectly fine as SnV. I usually have it with t work with some other flavors, but I mainly grab for this one. Bonus: This was the recipe that made me like CAP Sugar Cookie as I hated it before. Good shit!

I have to agree with kitu5. Without a sweetener it tastes a bit off. I added CAP Super Sweet to it, and it's a good ADV. The lemon flavor fades quite quickly, so 2-3 days of steeping is the sweet spot for this juice. Great job!
